title: Країна У
overview: "Країна У" is a Ukrainian sketch on the TET TV channel, which is an adaptation of the British original version called "Little Britain". In each episode, the viewer sees separate life stories. Events take place in all cities of Ukraine where the characters live. Each of them has its own unique character as for example, friends-gossips Dasha and Khrystyna or gopniki in a dormitory.They have no superpowers but one: to get into very funny situations. This is what the characters do throughout the project. It is the ability to laugh at themselves that helps them easily find a way out of any difficult situations. Watch the project "Країна У" and get positive emotions.
